title: samiksha_portfolio
text:
M.S. Data Science and Analytics '24
  Georgetown University
                        samikshathikekar8@gmail.com
                      
                    
                  
        
                
                
                  
                    
                      
                        A bit about me
                      
                    
                    
                      I'm a Georgetown University graduate with a Master's in Data Science and Analytics and about two years of industry experience, blending academic rigor with real-world application. My educational journey began at the University of Mumbai, where I earned a Bachelor’s degree in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering.
                    
                     
                      After completing my undergraduate, I worked as an Associate System Analyst at National Stock Exchange of India (NSEIT LTD) in the fintech industry, gaining experience in front-end development, database management, and data analytics, and mastering tools from Python to Tableau and beyond. At Georgetown, I also worked as a Graduate Data Analyst with the Center for Global Health Practice and Impact, analyzing healthcare data to provide critical insights for health system needs assessments.
                    
                    
                    
                      I'm a strong believer in data science's ability to extract valuable insights from large datasets and address real-world challenges that might otherwise remain useless. My journey from the University of Mumbai to the vibrant corridors of Georgetown has been fueled by a passion for leveraging data to solve complex challenges across various sectors.
                    
                    
                      When I'm not immersed in academics or data analysis, you can find me exploring my creative side through painting, enjoying leisurely walks, or experimenting with new quick recipes in my cozy kitchen.
                    
                  
                
              
            
          
        
      
    

        
        
            

                
                    
                        
                             Projects
                             A Glimpse into My Work.
                            
                        
                    
                

                

                
                
                 
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                
                            
                            
                             
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        US Natural Gas Industry Analysis
                                        
                                            Time Series Modeling Jan 2024 - May 2024
                                        

                                        
                                        This project explores various aspects of the natural gas industry in the United States, utilizing multiple datasets spanning 2005 to 2022, focusing on prices, consumption, production, imports, exports, stocks, and CO2 emissions and employing a combination of univariate, multivariate, and financial time series models, alongside cutting-edge deep learning approaches.
                                        
                                        view here

                                    
                                
                            
                            
                        
                           
                        
                        
                
                 
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                
                            
                            
                             
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        Diabetes checkpoint pro app
                                        
                                            Machine Learning · App deployment · Flask · Heroku Aug 2023 - Dec 2023
                                        

                                        
                                        In this project, a thorough analysis of the Diabetes Health Indicators Dataset from the UCI Repository, employing 21 diverse features, is conducted. Further, advanced generative and non-generative methods are applied to predict diabetes based on healthcare statistics. The project culminated in the development and deployment of a Flask app for diabetes prediction on Heroku.
                                        
                                        view here

                                    
                                
                            
                            
                        
                           
                        
                        
                        
                
                   
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                
                            
                            
                             
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        Analysis on Entertainment Reddits
                                        
                                            Big Data · AWS · Azure · EDA · NLP · Machine learning Aug 2023 - Dec 2023
                                        

                                        
                                        This project focuses on using big data analytics to extract insights from Reddit interactions within the entertainment communities. EDA is employed to uncover engagement patterns and identify key contributors, while NLP delves into the sentiments and themes within user discussions. The application of ML techniques facilitates predicting post popularity and categorizing content.
                                        
                                        view here

                                    
                                
                            
                            
                        
                           
                        
                        

                    
                    
                        

                            
                            
                                
                            

                            
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        Global Coffee Market Analysis
                                        
                                            Data Visualization Jan 2023 - May 2023
                                        

                                        
                                        Through this project, a caffeinated journey unfolded to
                                            explore the ever-evolving coffee market, both in the U.S. and around the
                                            globe. The mission aimed was to decipher consumption trends, savor demand
                                            patterns, spill the beans on imports and exports, and unveil the secrets of
                                            popular coffee hangouts. This project serves as a delightful brew for
                                            understanding the global coffee scene!
                                        
                                        view here

                                    
                                
                            
                            

                        
                    
                    

                    
                    
                        

                            
                            
                                
                            

                            
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        Soccer Match Summarization
                                        
                                            Computational Linguistics · NLP  Jan 2023 - May 2023
                                        
                                        

                                        This project analyzes thousands of data from the UEFA
                                            Champions League 2020-21 season. The goal is to bring the essence of each
                                            game through crisp, engaging summaries using advanced summarization
                                            techniques. It's like having a personal sports commentator right at your
                                            fingertips! 
                                        
                                        View
                                            here 

                                    
                                
                            
                            

                        
                    
                    

                    
                    
                        

                            
                            
                                
                            

                            
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        US Interest Rates Impact on the Global Economy
                                        
                                            Statistical Modelling · Machine Learning 
                                            Jan 2023 - May 2023
                                        

                                        
                                        This project embarks on a fascinating journey into the
                                            intricate interplay between US interest rates and the global economic stage.
                                            Through the magic of statistical modeling and machine learning, the secrets
                                            behind this captivating relationship are unveiled.

                                        
                                        Coming Soon
                                    
                                
                            
                            

                        
                    
                    

                    
                    
                        

                            
                            
                                
                            

                            
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        Data Science Job Hunt (Mini Project)
                                        
                                            Data Visualization · Data Storytelling 
                                            Apr 2023 - May 2023
                                        

                                        
                                        Discover how Python was leveraged to simplify the analysis
                                            of job postings in the USA, employing rigorous data cleaning techniques and
                                            data visualization to unveil crucial insights. This initiative aims to
                                            empower individuals with a comprehensive understanding of the evolving US
                                            Data Science job market.

                                        
                                        view here

                                    
                                
                            
                            

                        
                    
                    

                    
                    
                        

                            
                            
                                
                            

                            
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        Data Analysis in Clothing Industry
                                        
                                            Data Analysis · Machine Learning  Aug 2022 - Dec 2022
                                        

                                        
                                        This project harnesses data analytics and machine learning
                                            to delve into consumer sentiments, preferences, and buying patterns. The
                                            outcome? A valuable wealth of knowledge that sheds light on product success
                                            and the ever-changing world of fashion trends.
                                        

                                            
                                            View here

                                    
                                
                            
                            

                        
                    
                    

                    
                    
                        

                            
                            
                                
                            

                            
                            
                                
                                    

                                        
                                        TicketMaster- Concert Tickets Analysis
                                        
                                            Probabilistic Modeling · Statistical
                                                Computing  Aug 2022 - Dec 2022
                                        

                                        

                                        Ever wondered if the size of the venue, the artist's
                                            popularity, or even the day of the week could sway the cost of your concert
                                            ticket? This project delves into those questions! Statistical analysis
                                            unveils the secrets behind concert ticket pricing. From pop icons to cozy
                                            venues, the real show behind the scenes is uncovered.

                                        
                                        Coming soon

                                        Walk
                                    
                                
                                
                                    Taking a walk is my way to unwind, appreciate my surroundings, and keep myself
                                    physically fit all at once.

                                    into the boundless world of digital art.
                                
                            
                        
                    
                    
                        
                            
                          
                            
                            
                                
                                    
                                        Explore
